Class ClientRMI

    public class ClientRMI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterfaceRMI
    ClientRMI Class implements ClientInterfaceRMI This class manages the Client connection side
    Author:
    Luca Massini (all the code except the constructor method, the notifytodownload method and the JDocs), Federico Lichinchi (constructor method and notifytodownload method), Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)
